p: Leaves from five randomly selected 3-year-old tree clones of each chemotype were collected for quantitative reverse transcriptase (RT)–PCR analysis. Total RNA was extracted and reverse-transcribed into cDNA using the HiScript II Q RT SuperMix for quantitative PCR (qPCR) (Vazyme, China). The PCRs were performed using ChamQTM SYBR ® qPCR Master Mix (Vazyme, China) according to the manufacturer’s instructions on an ABI Step One Plus System with three replicates. Sequences of the gene-specific primers are listed in Supplementary Table S1. Relative gene expression was calculated using the 2 –△△ Ct method, and ACTIN was chosen as the internal reference gene to normalize expression levels.
